thread.title: iTunes Pass(TM) Now Available At RadioShack
thread.title_full: iTunes Pass(TM) Now Available At RadioShack

author: admin
title: iTunes Pass(TM) Now Available At RadioShack
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 10:01 AM   RadioShack 
FORT WORTH, Texas, Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- RadioShack, your neighborhood electronics store, introduces iTunes Pass(TM), the convenient way to easily add money directly into one's iTunes account. People can visit their local RadioShack and add any amount, from $0.01 to $500, directly to their account right at checkout. The funds can be used for apps, music and more within the iTunes Store. iTunes Pass will be available immediately at more than 1,700 RadioShack locations nationwide. 
"Launching iTunes Pass at RadioShack provides an easy and immediate opportunity for iTunes users, such as students who may not have their own credit cards, to add funds directly to their accounts at any of our neighborhood electronics stores," shared Michael Tatelman, Chief Marketing Officer, RadioShack. 
To add iTunes Pass to Passbook, open the iTunes Store on your iOS device, find iTunes Pass and tap Redeem, then Get Started. To add funds to your account, present your iTunes Pass to a member of the RadioShack team, indicate the amount you would like to add, and provide payment to the RadioShack team member. Your updated balance is available immediately. 
"RadioShack continues to work with the brands people want to bring unique experiences to our customers," added Tatelman. "iTunes Pass is a great example of how we bring solutions and convenience to the neighborhood shopping experience." 
RadioShack has built a reputation since its founding in 1921, as the solution for electronics enthusiasts and makers. Today owned by General Wireless, Inc. the new RadioShack offers a wide array of products and services to help consumers understand and obtain the most current and exciting offerings. 
About RadioShack RadioShack is a leading national retailer of innovative technology products and services, as well as products related to personal and home technology and power supply needs. The neighborhood electronics store offers products and services from top national brands and exclusive private brands as well as mobile services through its wireless partner Sprint, all within a comfortable and convenient shopping environment. Founded in 1921, RadioShack is owned today by General Wireless, Inc., which acquired the storied brand in March 2015. The new RadioShack has over 1,700 company-owned stores, including 1,400 Sprint Stores at RadioShack, located nationwide. Instagram: @radioshack | Twitter: @radioshack | Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RadioShack 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/itunes-pass-now-available-at-radioshack-300162009.html 
SOURCE RadioShack
